page.title: 10Maxell (U.K.)Ltd.
page.content: The main employment in the area is work at the{Maxell}factory,and work at the Apley nurseries.Only four people work at the Apley nurseries,so most work at Maxell.At Maxell,approximately 170 people work there.The main work at Maxell is making video tapes and cassetes.The main work done at{Apley {nurseries}are things like growing and selling shrubs and plants. The Maxell factory was built on 60 acres of grassland.The paid up capital is Â£4,000,000.Maxell's main company products are video cassette tapes,sound recording tapes and floppy discs.Also included in the product range are batteries.The managing director is Ken Kakurai.Some of the men working at Maxell are computer experts and chopper pilots.
